article_title: Apple Watch: How These Employees Can Get One For $25
article_text:

twitter.description:
Want an Apple Watch for just $25? All you have to do is get in shape.
That’s the deal several companies are offering their employees, as part of a wellness-incentive program offered through t...
twitter.title: These Employees Can Get Apple Watches for Just $25
